commits.message:
EC2 move describe actions to UFS - EUCA-10660

Stateless Describe* actions are moved from the Eucalyptus (backend)
component to the Compute user facing service component.

Shared code is moved to the compute-common module under the new package:

  com.eucalyptus.compute.common.internal

Unlike other common code this is intended to be internal and should not
be used other than by the EC2 service components. Backend specific
functionality was removed from common code prio to relocation, notable
changes follow.

There is a new VmInstanceMetadata class for handling instance meta-data
requests, this was moved from VmInstance.

Bundling specific code is moved from the VmInstance hierarch to Bundles.

Lifecycle and various other code is moved from VmInstance to
VmInstances.

VolumeUpdateEventListener and SnapshotUpdateEventListener are broken out
from Volumes and Snapshots into top-level classes.

EUCA-10660
